entry.title: $2500 // Charming 1bed/1bath apartment for rent
entry.content: Charming pre-war one-bedroom duplex located in the heart of sizzling Chelsea! Experience the ultimate townhouse life-style in a meticulously managed, well-established co-op. Steeped with turn-of-the-century details, this home features a dramatic sunken living room with almost 14 foot ceilings and 2 over-sized windows that invite light to cascade in throughout the day. Painted exposed brick, wood-burning fireplace and built-in bookcases create a warm and cozy sanctuary from the hustle and bustle of the outside world. Your very large eat-in kitchen perched just above the living room will surely please the chef in you! Whipping up a gourmet meal will be easy in this conducive environment, perfect for entertaining. The kitchen has been updated with wooden cabinetry and provides ample storage, including a large pantry.
